Menace
[i]Grim Resolve[/i] – When Naoise, Red Blade enters, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Naoise deals combat damage to a player, each opponent discards a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on Naoise.
Accost – Whenever Naoise, Red Blade deals damage to a creature, you may untap him. If you do, him and that creature fight. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]
